ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Happy Happy Joy Joy
ygData.msgSnippet: Very nice lass :o)  Sure beats my 2 bubbles of exp in Hell 2 for over 24 hours of playtime :oP  Oh yeah... I *did* happen to get some SS boots from a guildie,
ygData.messageBody:
Very nice lass :o) Sure beats my 2 bubbles of exp in Hell 2 for over 24
hours of playtime :oP Oh yeah... I *did* happen to get some SS boots from a
guildie, and a Tattered Mantle from Karnor's... I guess my weekend wasn't
that bad after all :o)

-=B=-
35th (closing in on 36... YES!)
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: Cheryl Kiraly <cheryl@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 25, 2000 8:18 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Happy Happy Joy Joy


> >From Friday night:
> I finally went to bed on Saturday morning at 2:00am a happy level 19. As
my
> guild was doing a Najena raid I really wanted to get back to the
"mainland"
> from Kunark on Saturday... Saturday night I still found myself in Kunark
> trying to help a friend get his char. to level 19 for the raid. We found
a
> great group near the goblin ruins at the Lake and just flew. We cycled
> through a heap of group members but almost always kept a full group. It
was
> insane! We were basically fighting non-stop pulling blues to yellows. We
> tried one or two pulls out of the Ruins and died massive deaths ;) So at
> 2am(+10 GMT) Sunday morning I made level 20! One level in one day! I was
> just wrapped! At 2:02am my first skill hit master and I was already off
> and pulling again for the group (after we stopped for some SS's of my
level
> 20 group). I had a guild member and friend that wanted to come along for
my
> naming "ceremony". So at 2:35am Jacana got her surname and more SS's were
> taken :) A few more pulls were done and then I went to bad a very happy
> camper.
>
> Sundays guild Najena raid was a bomb for us (and for the rest of the
guild).
> A group of us decided we were going to head back to Kunark. As we went
> through the forest we smacked around some DE's :) Then in ECommons I got
> side tracked (MMMMM! Male Half-Elf Bards) and they headed on with out me.
> Of the group of 5 two logged but 3 would still be enough in Kunark. So I
> finally caught up with them in FV and it was only then I realised I didn't
> get my songs I wanted. So I ran back to the boat in time to see it pull
off
> (bloody trams!). That was enough! Another member logged so two were
left.
> I shouted for a TP back to BB and we found one.
>
> Off to get songs I went. And suddenly got in my head that tonight was
> Lambent Bracers night! After a few hours of shouting I got my 'feene
charm
> and a lambent stone (from a friend) and the darkbone was already in my
bank
> from some nice people in Unrest days...
>
> So after I hit Eurdin for my songs it was off for the Lambents. I
realised
> when I got to the temple it said 550gp. I had everything in PP *DOH* So
> back to the bank I went and back again. Finally at about 10:45 last night
I
> ended up with my first piece of lambents!
>
> Also, I was given two amazing weapons by a very very sweet high level bard
> this weekend (as well as a few pieces of armour). My thulian claw and
> silvery war axe have been replaced with a Sainy's Claw and a Gleaming
Broad
> Sword (or is it short sword?)
>
> Now that's what I call bards luck ;)
>
> Smurf Wannabe,
> Jacana Mourningsong, Wood Elf Bard of the 20th song, Innoruuk
>
>
>
